Posts.Content: I am also sorry to hear about your wife to have relive this ordeal.  I also am primary angiosarcoma of the breast.  Corrie pretty much said it all about our AngioCommunity we started and is a great success in helping out ourselves.  I hope to see you and your wife join.  There is an amazing amount of information there for our community. My best wishes.  Lauren
Posts.Title: angiosarcoma and breast cancer
